resources.string:
Do you like RMaps?
 Buy RMaps.Donation on Google Play Store
 
 Do you want to help me translate the app interface? Write me to email robertk506@gmail.com
 
 v.0.9.4
 + Dashboard. Use Menu - Dashboard. Long press on dashboard to add or change value
 + I am here: Long press on the screen to point your location without GPS
 + Target point (use the map context menu)
 + Dashboard indicators: distance to target, initial bearing to target
 + Ability to use volume controls to zoom map
 + Ability to export import POI category with the POI
 + Ability to use custom cursors
 + Ability to download online map directly to online cache
 + Updated URL: Soviet Military Map, Yandex, Google
 - Improving downloader service, Track writer service
 - Fixed some GPX importing bugs
 
 v.0.9.3
 + Much improved measure tool. When you click on each point of the measurement line you can see the coordinates, distance, azimuth
 + Ability to use the app on devices without GPS
 + Long press on the map now shows the coordinates, altitude (online only), bearing and distance from your current position. Clicking on a black bubble shows the context menu.
 + Coordinates formatting preference
 + Ability to set Zoom controls at the right
 + Ability to download layers offline
 + Built-in ability to download Geology and Geophysics offline maps from www.dpi.nsw.gov.au/minerals
 - Fixed scale bar bug
 - Fixed some POI bug
 
 v.0.9.2
 + Opened Google Community RMaps on Google+
 + Measuring distances (Menu - Tools - Measure)
 + Distance circles around current location
 + Joining multiple tracks into one
 + New Relief map
 + Reload/update tiles tool on the screen online map (Menu - Tools - Reload screen tiles)
 + OSGB 36 for offline Ordnance Survey Map
 - Compass fix?
 - Loading circles after download fix
 - White POI on SONY fix
 - Google.Land, Google.Satellite fix
 
 v.0.9.1
 + BING maps (Roag, Aerial , Hydrid)
 + USA Topo maps, ArcGIS USA maps, USGS Topo maps
 + Improve usability of POI category list
 + Improve usability of maps list in settings
 + Line between current GPS location and center of screen
 + Share POI function
 + Altitude field in POI activity
 + Map offset function (useful for chinese users)
 + Stretch factor of map, ability to enlarge picture of any map
 - Offline maps bug fix
 
 v.0.9.0
 + Tile downloader
 + Sort POI, tracks
 
 v.0.8.12
 + New overlay feature (add overlay layer above map by one touch, create your own map+overlay pairs, flexibility overlay button on the map)
 + New ability to add your own map source
 
 v.0.8.11
 + New maps Cloudmade (OSM data) with comfort label size
 + Google scale factor. You can enlarge size of the labels on the map. See the preference of the map
 + Language preference. You can set UI language independent of system
 + Imperial units in statistic view
 + Track color, width, shadow
 + Multiple tracks on the map
 
 v.0.8.10.2
 + Support geo intents. You can tap address in calendar app and show it in RMaps
 - Bugfix support MNM files and c:geo app
 
 v.0.8.10
 + UI updates
 + Maps URL updates
 
 v.0.8.9
 + Crosshair on centre of the map
 + Added new map maps.refuges.info
 
 v.0.8.8
 + Update maps URL
 - UI improvement for high res screens
 
 v.0.8.7
 + New preference Directory
 + Now RMaps stores tiles of online maps on sdcard in sqlite format
 
 v.0.8.6
 + New maps: VFR (avcharts.com), MyTopo, OSM MTB Mapa Česká republika
 + Error report (please, send me message about force close)
 - Bug fix: Mutlitouch, Scale bar, more
 
 v.0.8.5
 + Scale bar, Units property
 
 v.0.8.4
 - Mutlitouch zooming
 + Zoom buttons settings: top, bottom, hide
 
 v.0.8.3.2
 + Ready to install to SD card
 + Update maps URL
 - Bug fix: Force close on Stop trackwriter on Froyo
 - Bug fix: Wrong date time on tracks. New tracks will be OK
 
 v.0.8.3
 + Export track to GPX, KML file
 
 v.0.8.2
 + Drawing of a current written track
 
 v.0.8.1
 + Track writer
 + Integration with Radar programs
 + New maps for USA aviators: VFR Chart, IFR Low, IFR High
 
 v.0.8.0
 + Import tracks from KML, GPX files
 
 v.0.7.7.1
 - Bug fix: Import some poi files
 + Delete all poi confirm dialog
 
 v.0.7.7
 + Import POI from KML, GPX files
 + Optimisation of drawing of POI
 + Update Yandex.Map URL, Google.Map URL
 
 v.0.7.6
 + Add localisation of Google Maps. See Preference
 + Added new online maps (Topographic map of Norway, Sea map of Norway)
 + Add screen orientation preference
 + Update Yandex.Map URL, Google.Map URL
 
 v.0.7.5
 + POI category
 + The back button close the search result window
 - Bug fix: OS Map
 
 v.0.7.4
 + Added new online maps (Docelu.pl Poland, Freemap.sk Slovakia, Slovakia Hiking, Slovakia Hiking HillShade)
 Do you want to add new online map? Write to me.
 
 v.0.7.3
 - Bug fix: 100 value zoom in sqlitedb format maps
 + Added new online maps (Microsoft Maps, Maps China, Virtual Earth, Hybrid, OSM Hiking Germany, OSM Public Transport, Outdooractive.com, Cykloatlas CZ, UMP-pcPL Poland)
 
 v.0.7.0
 + Minimum POI functionality
 + Integration with GPS Status by Rudolf Hornig
 + Move index data of offline maps to sdcard
 + Added buttons for clearing internal cache and index database to preference
 + Update Yandex.Map URL, Google.Map URL
 - Bug fix: Wrong compass orientation on landscape mode
